xmlText.p: First Period_1, Columbus, Savard 3 (Panarin, Kukan), 1:16. Penalties_Savard, CBJ, (delay of game), 9:22; Granlund, MIN, (holding), 12:48.

Third Period_3, Minnesota, Coyle 5 (Dumba), 12:10. 4, Columbus, Panarin 13 (Atkinson, Jones), 14:48 (pp). Penalties_Stewart, MIN, (slashing), 10:04; Zucker, MIN, (delay of game), 14:33.
